Package hw2

Class Basket

java.lang.Object
hw2.Basket
public class Basket extends Object
Represents a basket for holding reservations. It allows adding, removing, and retrieving reservations, as well as calculating the total cost of all reservations in the basket.
Since:
13/03/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Panagiotis Tsembekis

      public Reservation[] getProducts()
      Returns an array containing all reservations in the basket.

    • add

      public int add(Reservation newReservation)
      Adds a reservation to the basket.
      Parameters:
      newReservation - The reservation to add.
      Returns:
      The number of reservations in the basket after adding.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Reservation res)
      Removes a reservation from the basket.
      Parameters:
      res - The reservation to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was successfully removed, false otherwise.

      Clears all reservations from the basket.

    • getTotalCost

      public int getTotalCost()
      Calculates and returns the total cost of all reservations in the basket.
      Returns:
      The total cost of all reservations.
